Interface IGameScreen

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlphaCompositeScreen, ColorBoxesScreen, DiagnosticScreen, FalseFirstScreen, GameScreen, HelloWorldScreen, SierpinskiScreen, SplineEditScreen, SplineScreen, TwoBoxesScreen, ViewScreen

    public interface IGameScreen
    Interface For A Window Screen's Set Of Logic
    Author:
    Cristian
